gw.api.domain.invoice

Class PaymentPlanChanger

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.PaymentPlanChanger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover

    public class PaymentPlanChanger
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover
    Class that manages changing the payment plan on a PolicyPeriod.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Initialize a new Payment Plan Changer, which creates a full plan of its new charge installments based on the given parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaymentPlanChanger

        public PaymentPlanChanger(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                  PaymentPlan newPaymentPlan,
                  PaymentHandlingDuringPaymentPlanChange paymentHandling,
                  com.google.common.base.Predicate<InvoiceItem> itemsToReverseOrRemove)
        Initialize a new Payment Plan Changer, which creates a full plan of its new charge installments based on the given parameters. Use getInstallmentPreview() for a preview of the new items.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - To set the new payment plan on.
        newPaymentPlan - New payment plan to use for this PolicyPeriod.
        paymentHandling - Whether to redistribute or just reverse affected payment items.
        itemsToReverseOrRemove - Filter to select what current items on the policy period to reverse or remove before building new invoice items.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstallmentPreview

        public java.util.List<ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry> getInstallmentPreview()
        Returns:
        A list of ChargeInstallmentChanger entries representing what the new installments will look like after this Payment Plan Change, including those marked for removal or reversal.

      • getLocalizedSummaryOfUndistributablePayments

        public java.lang.String getLocalizedSummaryOfUndistributablePayments()
        Returns:
        Formatted and localized warning message if were payments on this policy period that can NOT be redistributed because the total payment against a single charge was of the opposite sign from the invoice item amounts on that charge. If no such payment are found, this method returns null. Such payments have been prevented since version 3.0.8, so this is most likely data created from an earlier version. Redistributing such upgraded data is unsupported in this version. Consult support for a workaround.

      • getPaymentsThatWontBeRedistributed

        public java.util.Map<BaseDist,AllocationPool> getPaymentsThatWontBeRedistributed()
        Returns:
        Payments on this policy period that can NOT be redistributed because the total payment against a single charge was of the opposite sign from the invoice item amounts on that charge. These payments are mapped to the gross and commission amounts unable to be redistributed. Such payments have been prevented since version 3.0.8, so this is most likely data created from an earlier version. Redistributing such upgraded data is unsupported in this version. Consult support for a workaround.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Execute the planned changes, which will reverse or remove this PolicyPeriod's previous installments and generate new ones.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Cleans up the temporary unused invoices and invoice streams. Should be called when a PaymentPlanChanger is not going to be executed.

      • getInvoicesForRemoval

        public java.util.Set<Invoice> getInvoicesForRemoval()
        Specified by:
        getInvoicesForRemoval in interface com.guidewire.bc.domain.invoice.ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover
        Returns:
        A Set of Invoices this ChargeEntryUnusedInvoiceRemover believes are no longer needed and can be removed
